body:
Comment 6: 
I can't make you program crash. If you tried to demonstrate your problem, you didn't
succeed. Please change your program accordingly.

Also, it would help if you could make your demo as small as possible. Everyone's time is
limited, this way you have a better chance of people actually looking at your code.

Thank you.

Alex
_Owner changed to @alexbrainman._ _Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
